name: Double Stretch
description:
Double Stretch - an unusual top down flight shooter. Hardcore combined with the simplicity of this game will give you a chance to experience a pleasant, nostalgic feeling. For the most stubborn players there will always be an incentive to set new records that will add to the game the spirit of competition with yourself or friends behind one computer. Double Stretch. has nice graphics and good sound, so when you go into it just to relax, you will enjoy every minute of the game into it.
Features:
-2.5D Graphics
-Sound accompaniment
-Game saves your highscores
-Great gameplay
